body_html:
I found contrib will be moved to outside repository in tensorflow 2.0 road map.

  • https://www.tensorflow.org/community/roadmap

I hope tensorflow API will be more user-friendly in tensorflow 2.0. So, this issue wil be solved in tensorflow 2.0.

body:
I found contrib will be moved to outside repository in tensorflow 2.0 road map. 
 * https://www.tensorflow.org/community/roadmap

I hope tensorflow API will be more user-friendly in tensorflow 2.0. So, this issue wil be solved in  tensorflow 2.0.
